buildTarget.description: The target to run to build you the app

buildTargetOptions.description: Additional options to pass into the build target.

waitUntilTargets.description: The targets to run to before starting the electron app

port.description: The port to inspect the process on. Setting port to 0 will assign random free ports to all forked processes.

remoteDebuggingPort.description: Enables remote debugging of the renderer process on the defined port.

inspect.description: Ensures the app is starting with debugging

args.description: Extra args when starting the app
